snippet: Are apps that try to connect you with people you might want to meet nearby a sleeper success, or a bit of a dud? A report from South by Southwest Interactive.
abstract: Are apps that try to connect you with people you might want to meet nearby a sleeper success, or a bit of a dud? A report from South by Southwest Interactive.

headline.main: Are Apps That Connect to Potential Friends Nearby a Hit or a Miss?
